availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert H. Wearen (Garrard County, KY carpenter)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, house carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of Drury and Hetty A. Wearen. Married to Mary E. Rainey Wearen on January 13, 1864. Father of Malcomb Wearen. House carpenter in Lancaster, Garrard County, in 1860. Member of the Independent Order of Odd Fellows.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1, p. 224.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Lancaster, p. 636.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 115.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lincoln County Marriages 1851-1902, Film #001904136, p. 171 of microfilm
Find A Grave, "R.H. Wearen (1837-1886)," Memorial #41659505, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/41659505 (accessed November 29, 2018).
